Plot: When a widower with 10 children marries a widow with 8, can the 20 of them ever come together as one big happy family? From finding a house big enough for all of them and learning to make ...
Title: Yours, Mine and Ours
Writer: Bob Carroll Jr. (story), Madelyn Davis (story), Mort Lachman, Melville Shavelson
Actors: Lucille Ball, Henry Fonda, Van Johnson, Louise Troy
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
